other_tests.findings: ST-segment elevation in leads V1, V2, V3; sinus tachycardia at 119 beats per minute.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Persistent ST-segment elevations noted upon subsequent admission; complete resolution of ST-segment changes and restoration of R waves in leads V1, V2, and V3 was observed 21 months after initial presentation.

other_tests.findings: Left main artery normal; minor stenosis in left anterior descending artery; right coronary artery free of clinically significant disease.
Akinesis of the anterior wall, hypokinesis of the apical and distal inferior walls, 45% LVEF.
Severe segmental left ventricular dysfunction with estimated LVEF of 48%.
